# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
### English
Project Monitoring and Evaluation for Résilience and Inclusion through Investment in Sustainable Agriculture (RIISA) Project in the Philippines

### French
Controleur de projets pour l’évaluation du projet de Résilience et inclusion par l’investissement pour une agriculture durable à Philippines


## Reference Number
cb-198-17893568


## Solicitation Number 
23-238920


## Tender Closing Date
* Date: 2024-04-25T14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* Deadline in 15 days

## Solicitation Description
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking a project monitor to provide project monitoring and evaluation services for the Résilience and Inclusion through Investment in Sustainable Agriculture (RIISA) project in the Philippines.

## Objective
The contractor is expected to monitor the project's progress and performance, identify lessons learned, best practices, risks, and associated implications for project implementation. The contractor will also provide analysis and advisory support through document review and field data collection to ensure the project achieves results, and assess the effectiveness of the project’s operational structure and management processes.


## Evaluation and Selection Criteria
The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price


## Business Requirements
The contractor is required to have expertise in project monitoring and evaluation, particularly in the subject matter of sustainable agriculture and resilience building in developing countries. The contractor must have worked in similar projects and have experience in providing project monitoring and evaluation services to international development organizations.


## Contact Information
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this RFP, please email Christian Meghaizel at [christian.meghaizel@international.gc.ca](mailto:christian.meghaizel@international.gc.ca). 

## Submission Instructions
All tender submissions must be sent to the following email: [tender-submissions@international.gc.ca](mailto:tender-submissions@international.gc.ca) with the title "23-238920 - RIISA Project Monitoring and Evaluation Services" in the subject line.
